comments.text: waiting time less than 1 minute! Steep place!!!
The best place to go to Kiev.
Nice spot, many cars. I've waited 15 minutes and take a minivan straight to Ternopil. The road is not bad - 2 hours and I was in Ternopil.
Great spot, lots of traffic.  A sign for Vinnytsia managed to get me to Ternopil quickly.
otherwise you have the bus going half way for 1.5 euro... and then continue HH or take other bus... it will take ages anyway...
In direction Ternopil
A big shoulder, if you stand in the shadow of the trees, you won't be sunburned and the drivers will have a longer time to see you and decide.
East - Ivano-Frankivsk, West - Dolyna and Lviv. Good place for hitch but you may waiting for a long time. Also every time say to the rider that you are hitchhiking before siting to the car
i was told not to stay on the border toll and to ask cars at the gaz pump or restaurant 200m before. Got a lift easily to Budapest
A custom officer was so kind and stopped a car for me.
Cars have to stop in the border. Ask them. Budapest, Debrecen or Nyregyhaza
it’s ideal if you go from ped border crossing from slovakia, many cars from there go here, i got a ride from a postman from Nova Poshta (Нова пошта)  from the boarder to this spot:)
There should be a stop here for transport going to Uzhhorod, so it is convenient for cars to stop. Many people travel from Chop to Uzhhorod during the day to work or to the doctor
Direction to Lviv
After WOG petrol station. Straight road, enough space for cars to stop. To Cherkasy
We took in 10 min rainy day
Very good place, just behind traffic light. 5 minutes and you in the car.
waiting time 15 minutes
waiting time 10 minutes
waiting time 15 minutes
waiting time less than 1 minute! Steep place!
waiting time 10 minutes
waiting time 10 minutes
road is empty, but we took the first machine. The waiting time of 15 minutes.

You can get a car here to Vinnytsia.

It's right after turn, so cars slow down a bit.
A place to hitchhike to Vinnytsia. Just next to bus stop. Locals can take you to Berdychiv. Take it but don't leave M 21.
возле заправки всегда клюет: Киев либо Винница, Бердичев
перекресток, в Казатине называется "асфальт", можно уехать в Киевчерез Белую Церковь, в Винницу или Бердичев, в Центр Казатина либо район ПРБ
Good place for hich in Lviv right at the traffic light. Less than 10 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place for hich in Kolomiya. Less than 10 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place for hich in Ternopil. Less than 10 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place for a hich Striy or Kalush. Less than 10 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place to stop in Kolomyja or Chernivtsi. Less than 5 minutes and the car.
Good place for hitch to Ivano-Frankivsk. Less than 5 minutes and we are in the car.

There are large space to stop.
In the gas station, you can use Wifi for free.

To Kiev
There is bus station, you can pick up a truck here.

good place to hitchhiking, good traffic. Road to Vinnytsa.   
I stay in this point 10 minutes

Nice place to hitchhiking, good traffic. Road to Kyiv.   
We stay in this point 5 minutes

Very nice place to hitchhiking. High traffic. Road to Rivne.   
We stay in this point 5 minutes

Nice place to hitchhiking.After petroleum station. Road to Rivne.   
We stay in this point 5 minutes

Nice place to hitchhiking. Road to Rivne. good traffic
We stay in this point 5 minutes
perfect place to stop a car to Rivne or even Lviv. good visibility and place for stop
two times was stopping car near the buss stop.  two times we waited half a hour. you can walk there from buss (47) stop
Very good place! Broad roadside, near trolleybus stantion. Nice place if you go to Khmelnitskiy, or Kam'janets Podilskiy.

small Petrol station. 

If you want to reach lvivski oblast look for B in car numbers, AA is the capital - Kiev. Big tranzit  goes here to the west, so good luck:)

Drivers prefer to use other stations - mybe in Zytomir, that one is probably costy. But its the only  one here:)
30 sec - 5 min

I hiked it to this spot from the town; possibly further.  Good places to stop all along the road.  I had a sign for Moldova, which was a bit risky being so far, but I got lucky with a ride all the way to Chisinau.
Road to Izmail, Vilkovo.You can get here by bus №1, this is last stop.
For Kharkiv, stand directly behind the crossroad to Artemivka.
Stand behind gas station. We (2 guys) waited about 30min.
Very nice spot to Kharkiv.

We (2 guys) stopped a car after a short while that promised to take us to Kharkiv after an hour. Unfortunately the driver didn't come back, so we started hitchhiking again and found a ride to Poltava instead. You can try to use a sign if you want to go further.

nice spot to poltava or further
hitchhike after the three petrol stations.

Do not enter the city of Krasny Luch even if driver insists. This road crossing is your best option. Stay not far away from traffic police post.
---
Не заїжджайте до Красного Луча, навіть якщо водій вмовляє. На цьому перехресті біля поста ДПС файна позиція, і трафік є.
roundabout where yalta and bakhchisaray directions split.
Good spot for Vinnytsia or local towns.
to Chernigov
Here is a buss-stop and right after that it's plenty of space for cars to stop. Slow traffic. Take a local buss to here from the center.

Secret spot from a local.
you take any bus in Kiev direction till Karpusi bus stop then walk a little along the road up until it gets straight. Its a roadside with plrnty of space, kind of in the middle of nowhere but worked for me every time and became a favorite spot after 10+ rides in the direction Kiev.

Already hitchhiked here twice, both times the wait time was around 15-20 minutes. It was in summer, and there were many cars, so just had to wait for one to stop. Destination was in Dolyna both for us and the drivers.
It took me no time to get a ride almost directly to Kiev
Good spot
There's either a gravel parking spot or a bus stop without any signage whatsoever. Both should work just fine.
An excellent fast way to go to Lviv, Mykachevo, or the main road. Close to the river and the centre of the village.

Great stop to hitchhike towards Lviv, Halych, Burshtyn, Rohatyn. We just raised our hand, and the car stopped! The easiest way to get there is to catch any bus to the bus station, go along Halytska Street (north-eastern direction), then stop by the gas station (OKKO) on your left for a coffee/bathroom/snacks and then walk 5 more mins until you reach "Ivano-Frankivsk" sign.
Last stop of 48 bus. Stop called Hoshkeldy.
somewhere on this road near the truck parking ... direct to west abort78

Very useful point to combine cheap train to Debaltseve and a hitchhike further to Russia.
Дуже зручна точка, коли треба поєднати дешевий поїзд до Дебальцевого та поїхати автостопом далі до Росії.
Тернопіль, Бучач, Монастириська

Я кожного разу коли хочу доїхати на Франкіаськ стою саме тут. Але вам треба вставати так щоб вас бачили. Дуже легко звідси доїхати до Бучача, до Франківська інколи буває треба довше постояти, але скільки б не стояв завжди доїдеш, виняток - ніч. Вночі вже важче звідси добратися кудись
Great way to hitchhike to Kharkiv from the North of Donetsk Region
Good place for hitchhiking. Waiting 20 min.
Cars go here very quickly, very rarely someone stops. Most drivers refuse to haul you out of money.

To Kharkiv: Take metro to Boryspilska and walk out of the city. After the huge roundabout there is a bus stop. Many locals hitchhike here. Try to be different, stand a little bit behind them (close to the motorway sign), show your backpacks and make the thumb gesture.
Took the bus to the shopping mall and then walked here. Good spot, if people want they can pull over on the wide shoulder. Ride to Mikolaiv in 5min.
I've been waiting here for about 50 minutes on Monday in winter and nobody stopped. So I had to change a spot.
I am sorry! My mistake, the mark should be one road to the right! Through Rohatyn !
We waited 45 minutes in the very morning and got a nice ride.
Towards I-Frankvisk. There is place for cars to stop and they all go your direction.
Many people are taking people to border for money so check before joining. You can get marshrutka if desperate.
After waiting for over an hour one guy  I asked for a ride paid me a Marshrutka ticket to the border.
There is a place for cars to stop although it is usually taken by a Marshrutka going to the border with Transnistria. Cars do not stop eagerly.

From UA to PL - it is doable, and many people (especially locals) do it, but as most of them smuggle cigarettes and alcohol, if you have a big bagpack most of the drivers will be afraid (as the driver also takes responsibility in law).

If you are on a bike or foot, you have to get a place in a verhicle here as crossing on foot is not permitted. 

2 peope and 2 bikes, we found a lift after asking around for about 15 minutes. YES.

this border crossing is for cars only (very bad for UA->PL). you WILL get stuck here for many hours inside a car, can't swap/abandon rides as number of passengers gets registered once inside the waiting area.
Not bad traffic. I take the car in 20 minutes to Rohatyn in very foggy weather.
Not that much traffic but I was lucky to get a ride straight to Ivano-Frankivs'k in 20 minutes.
There is some place for cars to stop near a petrol station. May be a good option for going towards Ivano-Frankivsk.
Good place to Stryi or Uzgorod
We waited only 20 minutes and took a car to Stryi. Good place to go south from Lviv

Right after the turn from supermarket parking lot - great place for hitchiking  southern (or east-west) direction. It took us only 10 mins to catch a car to Mykolaiv, and the road heading south is quite good quality!

Take bus 53 leaving from Vynnychenko street till last stop and walk a bit further.
I (1 girl, sign to Rivne) got picked up within ten minutes and I was brought to Rivne.
I did not even walk that far, because already earlier there is plenty of space to stop at the side of the road...
Bus stop after the traffic lights
Warning ! It was not the last stop of my trolley bus, it turned before and I had to walk a lot :/ just make sure it's the one you're trying to get too - the spot is perfect once you are there ! ;)
I got a ride after 20 minutes, there is a lot of place for cars to stop.
Great hitchhiking spot towards Uman' & Odesa. Get there by metro station Lybidska & trolley bus #2, last stop.
Good place for hitchhiking in Lviv direction. There you are on the top of hill, visibility is almost 1 km.
Bus stop. There are bumps on the road and cars go on a low speed. Zolochiv direction.

It's good place, if you are going to Kyiv
Отличное место, если едешь в Киев
Дуже вдале місце, для стопу у Київ
We had hitchhiking race starting here and 9 couples got picked up here in 3 hours total.

To Cherkasy

You can get here by bus 43 or marshrutkas 311, 313, 315. It's 'On Demand' stop, right after 'Sanatoriy Koncha Zaspa' stop
There are two petrol stations. Good place if you are heading to Ternopil or Berezhany
After 20 min waiting I took a ride to Ternopil.
low traffic but good place to catch some car to Ternopol
Spot near "Автомеханіка". Good visibility. Ternopil direction
Good place for a hitch to Kalush or Ivano-Frankivsk Less than 15-20  minutes and you're in the car.
After 30 min waiting I took a ride straightly to Stryj.
Rather good position. If you go in Lviv direction - its for you. Many cars go out of the city and on a low speed.
Spot just behind bus stop. Super place, wonderful visibility. A few minutes and you are in the car.
Nice position. Here is a good place where car can stop. You are very visible for drivers. Waiting time - 10 minutes.
waiting time 10 minutes
waiting time 20 minutes
waiting time 20 minutes
Ехал в Харьков в понедельник, регулярный поток машин, уехать удалось за 15 минут
Spot behind gas station. Bus №17 from city center. Then you have to go  aproximately 1 km.
Straight part of the road. Approximately 0,5 km from petrol station. Good spot in Ivano-Frankivsk direction.
200 metres from city boundary. Road has some bumps in this point, cars go at a low speed.
Lots of drivers use this road to get from Vinnytsia to Zhytomyr and/or Kyiv. You can try to hitchhike while walking to crossroad.
I recommend taking a bus or trolley out here as it's a direct shot then to Rivne
Place to catch a car towards Bibrka (then either Lviv or Ivano-Frankivsk). There is a bus stop next to grocery stores and local restaurant, so you can get some snack before leaving the village!

We were dropped here in the way from Lviv to Bibrka (direction Ivano-Frankivsk) next to turn to Sholomyn' village. There is a nice shade from trees and some space for the cars to park. Good spot for Ivano-Frankivsk or Bibrka.
можно ехать в Центр Казатина, через ПРБ на перекресток "асфальта" либо в сторону Винницы либо Бердичева
отсюда на Казатин будет быстрее
можно уехать на Винницу, рядом пост ГАИ
Good place for hich in Ivano-Frankivsk. Less than 15 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place for hich in Chernivtsi. Less than 20 minutes and you're in the car.
Good place. Many times went from this place in Yaremche/
Great place for heading towards Nadvirna and Yaremche. The biggest disadvantage - no trees, so pretty hot in the summer!

You should come to bus station "dachna" just after intercross near Zhytomyrska metro station. There you can catch a bus that goes to suburbs and ride for 5 km, go out on Stoyanka station. Then you need to walk for 500 metres to a small petrol station of TNK company. There will be a sign with "Stoyanka" crossed. You will see it.
The BEST place to hitchhike in Western direction (Rivne, Lviv, Poland)
Just smile and keep faith ;)

good place to hitchhiking, good traffic. Road to Kyiv   
I stay in this point 10 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but so bad traffic. Road to Nemyriv.   
I stay in this point 20 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, normal traffic. Road to Pechera.   
I stay in this point 20 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but so bad traffic. Road to Vinnytsa.   
I stay in this point 15 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but so bad traffic. Road to Vinnytsa.   
I stay in this point 40 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, normal traffic. Road to Vinnytsa.   
I stay in this point 20 minutes

Nice place to hitchhiking. Road to Rivne. normal traffic
We stay in this point 20 minutes
stay 5 minutes

Nice place to hitchhiking. Road to Zhytomyr. Near stantion metro Zhytomyrska.  
We stay in this point 15 minutes
you can get car for couple of km to parting
if u going to Ternopol or Chortkiv this place is for u. after Police post cars going 40-50 km/h
u can stop car before the railways. there is plany of place. but don't forget to say that u got no cash
after you cross rail u can get car very easy. cars going 30-40 km/h
the best place in Mykachevo to find a car to Uzhgorod. But u should don't forget to say that u r without money cause here in Mykachevo people working in tourist transfers
perfect place to get a car to Uzhgorod or Mykachevo
this place is between gas station and traffic lights. cars going slower here and they see you from far away
u can easly get a car here to Rivne or on long distance.
cars going slowly and there is a good place for cars to stop in sunny weather.
you can easly get a car here to Zhytomyr or even Kyiv. drivers  going fast but they see you clearly.

Good place to hitchhiking if you go to Kamenet's Podilskiy, Chernivtzi.
But this place don't have broad roadside/  
We stay in this point 15 minutes
Gas station
Make a sign for Київ and wait. Originally I had a sign Житомир thinking that people would pass through there on the way but there's a highway that circumvents that city and goes directly to Kiev.
To the west
Good point for HH to the west
Its an international road from Belarus to Romania, so there are a lot of traffic. North - Ternopil, south - Czernivtzi.

This is the best spot to the Kyiv/Poltava/Dnipropetrovsk direction

Usually I'm waiting 5-15 minutes here
In direction Stryj
In direction Lviv
Before the border is fueling station, where you can catch a car to move abroad. A lot of cars are going to Lublin or even more: Warsaw, etc.
to Kherson
Good point to hitchhike from Mukachevo to Uzhgorod and west (Slovakia).
This is the Hitchhiking point for the M06, either northwest towards Uzghorod or northeast towards Lviv.
To the polish border
To Lviv
Good to hitchhiking in the side near to Romania
Good place to hitchhiking nearest Beregove and nearest cities
Make a sign, get eye contact, watch out for shady types though at the bus stop.  You'll get a ride no problem.
Just by the bus stop with lots of room to pull in.  Large sign for Lviv, but most people indicated they were staying local.  Persevere though, because there is plenty of traffic.
towards Černihiv
Bus stop
Bus stop.

Road to the west is to Rakhiv, north - Ivano-Frankivsk, south - Verkhovyna. Hitchability is not very good, because riders often wants money for the ride. But nature and local people are very beautiful!

Road to Odesa. You can get here by walk 1.5km after last bus stop which called "АЗС(AZS, gas station)". Bus №17.

Дорога на Одесу. Після кільця та залізничного переїзду машини їдуть повільно. Дійти сюди можна пройшовши 1.5км від останньої зупинки 17-го автобуса, яка називається АЗС.

Take 114 from by the Opera house (in front of hotel Lviv) and take it for 15min cca... Go left on the crossroad and best of luck!
We stood there (police on the other side), cars are quite slow just there and we got a ride to Polish border (Hrebenne) in 10-15min...
Traffic lights.
It was 8 in the morning, waited 20 mins and then took a direct bus to Černivci (50 UAH).
Jablunickij pass (931 m). A lot of space.
Truck driver took us to the pass. He told us there is a police checkpoint so have cannot take us (only two seats).
Good spot and nice swimming in the river.
I would stand few meters up the street, at the bus stop - cars have place to park there. Great road to Stryi, Drohobych and other southern cities :)
Before the traffic lights at the crossing of M6 and T1425, Mikolaiv. Good to head further south direction Stryi.

If you visit Pidhirtsi Castle, this is perfect spot to get to Lviv (Kyiv-Chop Highway). Road quality is quite good, and cars have space to park (there is a bus stop, so in case no car stops, you can catch a bus for about 20 UAH = 2 EUR). We were 5 people and we caught a mini-bus heading from Kyiv to Lviv without paying anything.

super-small filling station and traffic lights
 I found polish driver  which take me to Tarnów, however i was lucky - no car are stoping here.
a bit father there's a bus station, i think better place to hitchhike, with almost no traffic we were waiting 30 min
1 km from the foot border crossing is a filling station. It's a very good spot for hitchhiking towards Lviv.
Nice spot if you are heading to Yaremche. We were a bit afraid that noone would stop because of road police at the crossing, but everything worked out pretty well!

Good spot to start hitch-hiking out of Ivano-Frankivsk. You can get there with a bus (don't remember the number) towards Cherniyi village. We got a free taxi ride to the next big crossing from this spot.
From here (is a small bus station) you can take a car to Mayaky-Palanca (Ukrainian/Moldavian border), if you want to go to Chisinau, avoiding Tiraspol. I had a car in 4 min
For Kharkiv, stand behind the crossroad. We (2 guys) waited just a few minutes.

Krasongradsky povorot (Krasnohrad turn), a good spot for hitchhiking in all 3 directions - Krasnohrad, Kharkiv, Poltava, even at night. Lonely gas station.
---
Красноградський поворот - непогане місце для автостопу в усіх трьох напрямках (Красноград, Харків, Полтава), навіть уночі. Одинока АЗС серед поля.

From Kiev to Kharkiv you can take marshrutka #317a from Kharkivska district to Borispil. Stay on it until the last stop. Now you can walk about 2 kilometers and you will be at the cross P03 and M03. Behind it there is a gas station, you can hitchhike behind.
We (two guys) got stuck there in heavy rain. Maybe try a sign for Kiev, here are definitly cars going there.

To Kyiv, there are two gas stations after the big cross behind the zoo (get there via mashrutka #34, last station "Zoopark"). There is also a bus stop next to the first gas station, but drivers maybe won't see that there is space to stop. Better go to the second gas station (busier) and ask drivers there or hitchhike directly on the road in front of the second gas station.
Coming from Lviv, directly after the street going into Busk, there is a nice spot for continuing to Rivne.

bigger petrol station. although we were standing on the road where is lot of space to stop, but some cars already go pretty fast...we met other hher there and we got all picked up in about 10 mins all the way to Kiev:)

Fine road junction. Truck from Poltava turn right towards Sumy at this point. Plenty of local traffic in all directions. Still I wouldn't be walking here from Opishne.
---
Непогане перехрестя. Тут фури з Полтави повертають на Суми. Багато місцевого транспорту в різні сторони. Але йти з Опішного не бачу сенсу.

Important road junction: most of the traffic is transit Poltava to Kharkiv, also occasionally somebody goes from Karlivka to Chutove. Visibility good in both directions. Speed is high, however.
---
Стратегічне перехрестя: майже увесь транспорт транзитний + інколи виїжджають із Карлівки на Чутове. Гарна видимість в обидва боки, швидкість, звичайно ж, висока.

Major road exits the town at this point, no need to go downhill towards the bridge. I've been lucky with a truck driver directly to Poltava.
---
Основний виїзд із міста тут, нема сенсу спускатися далі до моста. Мені пощастило, далекобійник підкинув прямісінько до Полтави.

Major highway and a roadside restaurant. Fine spot, but some cars drive too fast (over 150 km/h).
---
Придорожній ресторан на жвавій трасі. Нормальний автостоп, однак деякі водії женуть під 150 і вище.

To my surprise, fine transit traffic from Kremenchuk to Reshetylivka. Even at late evening hours. No facilities at all, 2-lane road across the vast field.
---
На мій подив, досить жвавий транзитний трафік з Кременчука (я їхав на Решетилівку-Полтаву). Навіть пізно увечері. Однак цивілізації обмаль: двополосна дорога у чистому полі.

Noticeable road junction. Useful for both Poltava and Kotelva. Some traffic turns to Krotenky, however some heavy trucks go straight into the forest, to the sandpit.
---
Важливе перехрестя. Зручно як на Полтаву, так і на Котельву. Деякі машини повертають на Кротенки, але частина самоскидів їдуть прямо до лісу до піщаного кар"єру.

dir: sevastopol.
the cross for the ai petri road was a great place for hitching to sevastopol. you can get here with the marshrutka #30, #35.
Enough place for cars to stop. You can get here from Luts'k with a bus going towards Rozhysche.
There is some place for cars to stop near the petrol station. Good idea to get a ride towards Luts'k.
Some place for cars to stop near the petrol station. Good option for going towards Chernivtsi.
There is some place for cars to stop. A good spot to get a ride towards Lviv.
a commonly used spot to get into northeastern direction
theres a bus stop just behind the railway crossing
we (female-male) asked people on the parking lot and got a lift to stryi in 10 minutes.

Take the minibus 3a to the endstation "king cross" here is a big shopping center, where not only cars from the city stop by. a lot of traffic is also going out. and if the parking lot doesnt work just stand at the street.
Decent spot with a parking area for cars to pull into. Got a ride to the Polish border from here within 10 minutes.
Got a ride to Černihiv though it was really dark.
a very decent pedestrian border crossing.
towards border with Belarus
2 good places just past railroad tracks. Can't remember where exactly it is but taxi driver was going home to октябрськ and many cars where coming from the simferopol-moscow road.

Right after police post. There's speed limit so you have a chance to be seen and picked up.
You may get a bit more traffic after bridge coming from M-12

Direction Ternopil' Ð¢ÐµÑ€Ð½Ð¾Ð¿Ñ–Ð»ÑŒ. You can get here by mini bus called marshrutka Ð¼Ð°Ñ€ÑˆÑ€ÑƒÑ‚ÐºÐ° 36, 68, 75 to Vynnyky Ð’Ð¸Ð½Ð½Ð¸ÐºÐ¸. From here you can also walk behind the bypass M-06 (E40). It could be better place.
Cars have to stop in the border. Ask them. Budapest or Debrecen.
You have to wait here fo a lift to moldova because you cant walk through the boarder. But in my case the police helped me with that!
Its easy to get here a lift to ukraine. A lot of turkish trucks are passing by here. If you wanna go to chisinau just ask some of the drivers. Maybe it will cost 1-2 euros.

To North/Kiev. Plenty of space for a cars to stop right after unfinished old bridge.

There is also a cafeteria/gas station nearby.
Bus bay in which you can hitchhike in Kiev direction. You can walk here from city center without walking along the "highway"

this boarder does not allow you to cross by foot, i was unlucky and didn’t catch any car so i was walking from Krakovets (in Lviv there’s a bus station — 50 hrn or so). when i got to the boarder, border guards stopped me and warned that i couldn’t cross this border by foot, but they gave me a green light to ask the drivers in queue for me to cross with them. and DONT leave the car until you exit the boarder highway cuz you will have troubles with polish boarder control (it’s forbidden in poland
Автобусна зупинка майже навпроти дороги на Глиняни, в бік Тернополя, навпроти зупинки, також є заправка
Івано-Франківськ💗
💗Напрямок -Теребовля, Чортків
До Тернополя те що треба, інколи можна довше постояти, але завжди підберуть💗(автобусна зупинка на перехресті)

Отже, з цієї точки я дуже часто зупиняю. Там зупиняється дуже багато машин, тому що вони звикли що там завжди хтось стоїть і пиняє. Найлегше добраттся з цієї точки в напрямку Дружби, Теребовлі, Чорткова, а якщо пощастить, то і до Заліщиків можна і навіть далі(але то хіба фури вже) я зазвичай пиняю в напрямку Бучача, Івано-Франківська, на машину до Івано-Франківська зазвичай доводиться довше чекати, але це як коли. Щонайголовніше, це те, що в цій точці найкраще пиняти в вечері, після 18.00, якщо
водитель вообще ехал до анапы, так что отсюда представляется возможным уехать довольно далеко

A good way to go to Slobozhans'ke or Izum. 
No so many cars but the road is really pretty and small.
Good bus stop place for hitchhike, cars are still going slowly after traffic light.
Good place if you go to Chernivtsi or Yaremche
I was stay 30 min. at night there, but is anything light in this plase
Getting to Chernivtsi at evening, succesfull experience
Waiting at morning (5:30), but first car took me to the Verkhni Vorota
direction to Vinnytsia abort78
direct to uman abort78
first truck and have directions to Kiev abort78

At first I tried hitchhiking but no one stopped.  Then I went to the cars standing in line and tapped the drivers.  One girl agreed to take me across the border.  Keep in mind that this border cannot be crossed on foot.
This border does not allow crossing on foot. Hitch-hike before crossing. We did not ask for the officers to help, but they know and give us the easy way to go with the driver

Actually approached the border guard and asked him if he could stop a car for us (after pretending we didn't know we couldn't cross on foot), which he agreed to do with the first car :) Guess it all depends of their mood...

The border crossing is for cars only but if you are unlucky enough to talk to the border officer (actually, he is not a border officer but who cares, he is the first guy to stop you there), he will ask for a bribe (10 EUR) and force you into the first car to pass.

Please hitchhike before the border!
Nearly everyone wants money, but place is good.

Had no luck here because all the drivers wanted us to pay (3 guys) and it was late, [Blog Post about journey to Odessa through Tiraspol](http://www.hobospirit.com/hitchhiking-from-chisinau-to-odessa-via-tiraspol-transnistria/)
After visiting Transnistria, you can get to Odessa from here. Exactly after the border. In 5 min we had a car (2 pers)
Good place!
it's better to take a bus that goes to suburbs from the small bus station near by. You should ride for like 5 km and there it's easier to catch a car. ;)
Keep the faith!

I walked here from the Zhytomyrska metro.  Plenty of space to stop, but the traffic is very fast.  Keep your wits about you as drivers tend to undertake and will blaze by where you're standing.  Lots of traffic, but nobody biting.

we were also waiting there for quite some time but eventually got picked up by policeman who drove us little further to the petrol station with more traffic and plenty of space to stop, we got a truck ride there further on...there were some other people going north, got picked up pretty fast, plenty of space to stop...good luck:)
We were waiting 3 hours for a ride to Kiev or Rivne, but no cars stopped. Maybe a better place to hitchhike is further down the road where the M-06 continues.
Direction Rivne, Kiev.
good place, travelled from it ~500km (Akkerman)
At this point I was standing about 15 minutes, I was picked up and drove about 30 kilometers which is very good for Ukraine. :)
Spot behind gas station (100metres).

A good spot but some people say it may be dangerous there in the evening. Been there a couple times and every time the waiting was different. So, don't lose heart if you have to wait long :). Once I got a ride within 14 min.
Before we was picked up, We waiting near 2 hours to stop someone who went to Belarus.
Not many cars going through here but if you're stuck here you just wait it out
Stand after bridge to get more traffic

waiting around 30-40 min. at 16.00 
went to Kiev at 23.30
Rather bad spot. Many local cars. In my ocassion, I've waited 50 minutes for a car.
waiting time 50 minutes
I was hitchhing there but I was not lucky... people asked me for money. Than I just gave up because it was so windy and cold. Maybe next time.
Direction Kharkiv/Poltava - this is the last stop of Marshutka 317. Lot of place to stop and two gas stations.
I could not go away from this place to Kiev
Just otside of the city, good place to hitchhike towards Zaporizhia, usually takes few minutes to get a ride
место хорошее,но простоял час,с табличкой и без нее, и так и не уехал
Отличное место для стопа. Есть заправка и знак-ограничитель скорости. Фуру вы тут навряд остановите, но вот легковушку точно.
Get out at Chernihivskaya metro station and walk to the main road. If you walk past the marshrutka busstop you can start hitchhiking there. Good place to stop for cars.
Адекватне місце для стопу на Одесу

Normal place to hitchhiking near petroleum stantion, but so bad traffic. Road to Rivne.   
We stay in this point 40 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but so bad traffic. Road to Rivne.   
We stay in this point 15 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but so bad traffic. Road to Rivne.   
We stay in this point 30 minutes

Normal place to hitchhiking, but road have so bad traffic. Road to Ternopil.   
We stay in this point 15 minutes
cars going fast but they see you from far away

great place. many place, cars going slowly cause of parting
and gaining speed.

Bad place to hitchhiking if you go to Hotyn or Chernivtzi.
This place have broad roadside, but rules baned stop cars in this place.  
But we stay in this point 10 minutes
Some cars stop here
Road to the East - Kolomyia and Chernivtsi. Its a small road with not many traffic, and drivers stops rarely. Its better to stop some bus (15 UAH to Kolomyia in 2014)
Well, we heard that its a good place for a hitch to Odesa, but we was waiting more than 2 hours and noboby stopped.
Place to hitchhike to Odessa direction. You can arrive hire by autobus #3 up to the last stop (Varvarovka direction).
Its only way to get to the Askania-Nova. Traffic is medium, but its hard to stop some car, so prepare to waiting for a couple hours
East - Ivano-Frankivsk, West - Dolyna and Lviv. Good place for hitch but you may waiting for a long time. Also every time say to the rider that you are hitchhiking before siting to the car.
Ffter 30 min of waiting nice local people has picked us up. Prepare for a long waiting)))
North district - Ustechko (village where is the biggest bridge in Ukraine over Dnister) and Ternopil. There are not many traffic here. But landscapes are vey nice.

From the city center you need to go to the last bus stop by bus №29 or other, little walk forward and stop near the store farming. 

This is good position to go to the Smila, Uman, Vinnytsia, Dnipropetrovsk and Donetsk
Bad position, because in this spot many people who want to stop car with many (seals). Better idea to go 50m forward and stop car after bridge
If you need to get to Kiev, this is the best position for hitchhiking. Average time to catch the car does not exceed 30 minutes.

If you are traveling from Kiev to Chernigov or Belarus and you stopped in Brovary - you need to go to this place to go further. You need to get to the mall Terminal and pass it to the side out of town, there is a wide shoulder and is easy to catch the car. Also you can take the bus to this place from Kiev, so you will save time, since in Kiev is very difficult to catch the car. Just ask the bus drivers whether they should go to the shopping center Terminal.
Вариант доехать до Ковеля, Луцка очень не плохой.

A place where people stop rides to the Galych, Burshtyn, Lviv. You can get here by trolleybus #1,4,6,8 or many buses which goes to microdistrict "Pasichna". Orient - big green building (radioplant in past). Remember: forward direct is to Kalush, turn right - Lviv!
Got a ride to Novoselicja only (the next town).
Direction Chisinau. If the train comes - BINGO.
waited 40 mins, then moved to the rail bridge.
Roundabout. A lot of space to pull over, many cars stopping and going.
A small bus stop.
got a ride to Rachiv
In front of the bus station. Only traffic from the town.

Direction: east towards Mykoliav, Crimea

In front of one of these two gas stations on the M-14. Almost no traffic to the gas stations when I was there but plenty of room for TIR to pull over.
direct to west abort78

good place to hitchhiking, good traffic.Near petroleum station. Road to Zhitomyr/   
I stay in this point 10 minutes
Coming from Lviv, after the road from Radiviliv, it's possible to stop cars, even the driver told us, it's not allowed to stop there and better to look for a gas station to hitchhike behind.
We (two guys) were waiting 3,5h, maybe because of heavy rain. To Rivne maybe try a sign because to Rivne you have to turn right after appr. 15km.
Take a bus to Галицьке перехрестя (Halitzke Perekhrestya) and walk out of the city. Behind the Ukrnafta gas station is a nice spot. Can take some time anyway.

Stay here, no need to go further as there is long climb uphill. The road is narrow and inconvenient, however the traffic was good for me, went to Slavyansk.
---
Лишайтеся тут, оскільки далі у напрямку на Слав"янськ іде затяжний підйом. Дорога вузька і незручна, але трафік нормальний.

High-speed location. Don't expect much, still it's possible to get towards Poltava.
---
Швидкісна позиція. Не покладайте великих надій, але виїхати в сторону Полтави можна.

Quite possible to hitchhike towards Poltava (bus stop is nearby), however the speed is high and visibility is somewhat limited.
---
Можна ловити попутки на Полтаву (автобусна зупинка), але швидкість висока і видимість дещо обмежена.

Major highway (and major road works now in 2013), bus stop, curve, many local people and local traffic. Average or less then average spot, but if you got there, you have little choice. Approx. 50/50 chances you pick up a local bus or a car within 20-30 minutes.
---
Жваве шосе (і до того ще активний ремонт дороги у 2013р.), автобусна зупинка, поворот дороги, багато людей та місцевого транспорту. Шанси приблизно 50/50 що поїдете або маршруткою або машиною впродовж 20-30 хв.

Popular location among locals. Not a great site, but at least you are guaranteed to catch something towards Kotelva.
---
Популярна точка серед місцевих. Я не в захваті, але принаймні звідси можна виїхати у напрямку Котельви.

I had to escape Kozlivschyna, however the traffic speed is somewhat high and visibility is a bit obstructed.
---
Доводилося виїжджати з Козлівщини, але машини їдуть досить швидко, видимість трохи обмежена.

Be aware of much local traffic performing a left turn to Vakulentsi.
Зверніть увагу, що багато машин повертають наліво, на Вакулинці.

Main location to go towards Kotelva (few people go directly to Sumy though). Don't walk further since the road is narrow and there is a swamp. Traffic is ok for such a secondary road, however a bit complicated with a major railway crossing on the exit from Poltava (no cars when closed, and then 15-20 cars in a row).
---
Основна позиція на Котельву (на Суми навряд чи хтось напряму їхатиме). Не треба йти далі по трасі, бо дорога вузька, а обабіч болото. Трафік більш-менш для реґіональної траси, ал

Nothing special about this village (Stepne). But the road is paved and local traffic is fine, morning to evening. Possible to get a ride or a bus to Poltava.
---
Нічого цікавого у селі Степному нема, але дорога асфальтована і з ранку до вечора їздить багато місцевих машин. Можна спіймати машину чи автобус на Полтаву.

Better location for Kyiv, but requires a walk along the highway (not forbidden, but neither it is pleasant). Cars except for the left lane drive at moderate speed (60-80km/h), you might be lucky.
---
Дещо краща точка для виїзду на Київ, але треба йти по узбіччю вздовж шосе, що приємною прогулянкою не назвеш. Машини, окрім лівого ряду їдуть з помірною швидкістю (60-80), можливо вам пощастить.

It's actually a city limit but hitchhiking is poor here. A lot of traffic goes to Levada (highrise estate downhill), also transit but it's hard to distinguish between. Many trucks stop near this road cafe. Hitchhiking possible but expect long waiting time. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR GIRLS, the particular place is infamous for whore business.
---
Фактично це межа міста, але автостоп поганий. Багато машин їде на Леваду (жилмасив нижче під горою), є й достатньо транзитних, але важко розрізнити. Багато фур
dir: yalta, bakhchisaray. not the best spot as there's not really a parking lane, but cars in ukraine can stop anywhere for you (:
Walk something like 500 m down the road from the railway. There is a bus stop near a petrol station. Not that much traffic but still it's possible to get a ride towards Lviv.
Here is not crowded border with Ukraine and Russian Federation. If you have time, the best border to cross Ukraine. But you need to wait a long when hitchhiking.
Hitchhiking point for the M07 road west to Kovel and the Polish border.

Great spot! No cars at all and maybe one truck every 5 or 10 minutes (in winter) - but they stop for you. 
When you're going to Belarus make sure you get off before the road that leads to Chernihiv. Most trucks go straight to Belarus
Planned on going to the Larga border crossing but the friendly priest took us to the briceni checkpoint saying it was more used. Would probably recommend trying the latter.
Not very good place.
please dont try direct to the stryi just go to the lviv than to stryi .. so destroyed road ... and kill time abort78
to west :) abort78
after 39 minut i fuck up with directions to ternopil just start hitchhiking to the city gef direct after few minutes ... and pizza for free :))) abort78
near the gas station at 22:00 ... abort78

Nice place but it took me 5 hours to get a ride. But don't go further, drivers just get faster.
I went and then came back.
hitchhiking in Ukraine seems to be difficult these days. Stood at this spot (which seems perfect) for 6 hours without anyone even so much as slowing down to look at my sign.

Nice place to hitchhiking. It was after police post. Near this place bus stantion. 
We stay in this point 10 minutes

I don't know why but Crimea is seemed to be not a very good place for hitchhiking. We were waiting for 40 minutes, but nobody adreed to pick us up, only for MONEY. Probably, we did something in a wrong way. Probably. it was so because of October. That's it. 
---
Не знаю почему, но Крым не кажется особо удачным местом для автостопа. Мы прождали 40 минут, но нас так никто и не согласился подбросить, только за ДЕНЬГИ. Может быть, мы что-то не так делали, а может быть, просто был октябрь. Такие дела

Стопил с девушкой, уехали за 15 минут (был ноябрь на дворе)
Дважды ездил сам, по 3 часа стоял.
Better go to the next petrol station, which is about 5 km from here.
We trying to get to the polish border at 5 a.m.. But gave up after 3 hours.
First I remarked "Kiev" on my sketchbook, I think it was hard to find truck. It's better to remark "Uman" and ask driver to go Kiev.
To Kiev
cars from the city going really fast.
cars going not to fast and there is a buss stop
There is a road police office nearby, so cars don't stop. I walked to Koblevo
despite spot looks attractive (truck pit stop, market, cafes and parking) was waiting here for 3 hours
Big truck parking

Needless to say, in this area of Ukraine don't expect anyone to speak English. 
If you don't speak Russian, get familiar with the usual hitchhiking phrases in the language.

Direction Moldova-Transnistria.
This road has very low traffic but the occasional cars stop for you. You might need to get closer to the border village by village. Make sure the driver doesn't expect money before you get in the car.
Not many cars.

Hi-speed highway with separated lanes. Few cars would stop here.
---
Швидкісне шосе з розділеними смугами. Мало хто тут зупиниться.

Exit towards Kharkiv, unfortunately not so easy from Poltava. You can stay near the gas station, there is no other place, and the speed is pretty high. If you'd like to go uphill, nobody will stop at all!
---
Виїзд на Харків, нажаль у Полтаві із цим нелегко доводиться. Можна стояти біля АЗС, а більше й ніде, а швидкість досить висока. Під горку вам взагалі ніхто не зупиниться!

Broad highway crossing a village (speed limit 60 km/h), occasionally heavy traffic. It is possible to reach Poltava, but I don't recommend this location.
---
Широке шосе йде через село (обмеження 60 км/год), часом інтенсивний трафік. Можна виїхати на Полтаву, але я цю точку не рекомендую.

Handy place to escape towards Kyiv, it's only 5 min walk from Avtovokzal and city bus. However expect a lot (!) of locals especially during warm season. Few cars stop.
---
Зручне місце для виїзду на Київ, якихось 5хв ходу від зуп. громадського транспорту (Автовокзал). Але дуже (!) багато тюленів впродовж дачного сезону. Мало машин, що зупиняються.

З Полтави на Харків. Легкодоступна точка на перехресті основних трас, поруч є громадський транспорт і МакДональдс. Але часом багато тюленів, і часто потужний потік машин радше проїде повз аніж зупиниться.
---
From Poltava to Kharkiv. Easily accessible cross-road location, public transportation and McDonald's are also there. But sometimes plenty of local hitchhikers and the occasionally heavy traffic tends to speed up rather than stop.
I've been waiting for about 2 hours but finally got a ride to Sniatyn.
Enough place to stop but little cars going towards Sniatyn or Chernivtsi. You'd better avoid this road.
от украинской границы первые 100 км до Луганской дороги - полная глушь, 1-2 машины в 5 минут, обочина вся заросла, стопить негде, проблемное место.
A good place got a lift to Alushta, Yalta.
When you go from Kiev to Chernihiv or Belarus make sure you don't get to Brovari but take the highway around this place.
500m further there was a town limit, next morning caught a moscow-crimea car quickly
Crimea seems to be hard to hh. location not so bad, spent 4hours until dark - streetlamps in best location aren't working either.
Not a good spot. Very few cars and they go fucking fast. Got stuck there several times in summer. We even tried lying on the road for fun, so few cars were there.
место хорошее,но никто не забрал
Waited 20 mins, probably not a good spot to anywhere. Then took a bus from here to Chust.

This is a new hi-speed highway, so there is virtually no opportunity to stop. Keep the old road via Krasnohrad.
---
На новому швидкісному шосе навряд чи знайдеться можливість зупинитися. Тримайтеся старої дороги через Красноград.

Scarce traffic, be prepared to walk a distance. There is a bus Poltava to Ochkanivka.
---
Дуже мало транспорту, приготуйтесь шелепати пішки. Ходе автобус Полтава-Очканівка.

Very tough location, requires quite a walk from the nearest bus stop (behind the railway crossing), and there is nowhere to improve. I found myself very unlucky to get towards Opishne from here. Most traffic seems to be local, as the city limit is still far away.
---
Дуже незручна позиція. Треба шелепати пішки від кінцевої тролейбуса Ін.Зв"язку (за переїздом), і далі нема жодних перспектив. Мені непощастило виїхати на Опішне звідси. Мабуть багато місцевого транспорту, бо поле Полтавської битви в

Do not ever go this sensless way. Route is complicated and includes 3 railway crossings.
---
Не треба взагалі сюди їхати. Дорога плутає і перетинає три залізничні переїзди.

High speed, obstructed visibility and narrow dangerous part of the road (not yet improved). Better walk uphill towards Ivashky, there are gas station and cafe.
---
Висока швидкість, обмежена видимість та вузька аварійна дорога (поки її ще не розширили). Краще йдіть у сторону Івашок, там біля АЗС чи кафе.

It was absolutely useless to walk here from the Kotelva bus station. All transport (horses including :) is local, driving to the next farmhouse. No transit road observed.
---
Дарма я перся сюди пішки від автостанції. Увесь транспорт (навіть гужовий :) їде до найближчої хати. Скажемо так, транзитної дороги немає.
to Chernigov
простоял час,с табличкой и без нее.решил сменить позицию прошел по трасе 20 метров и подобрал таксист
